su.whs.watl.text

Class ContentView.Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • su.whs.watl.text.ContentView.Options
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextLayout.Options
    Enclosing interface:
    ContentView

    public static class ContentView.Options
extends java.lang.Object
    Options for ContentView implementations each setter returns Options
